summary: This bill, the Supporting Avian Virus Eradication Act (SAVE Our Poultry Act), aims to amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to prioritize research and extension efforts related to highly pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI). It focuses on providing grants to land-grant colleges and universities to study HPAI, specifically concerning vaccine development and biosecurity enhancement for poultry producers.
